meteringrange: EV 0 - EV 20 (at 73°F/23°C with 50mm f/1.4 lens, ISO 100)
label35: Exact file sizes depend on the subject, ISO speed, Picture Style, etc.
stillimage: JPEG, RAW (14-bit Canon Original), M-RAW, S-RAW, RAW+JPEG, M-RAW+JPEG, S-RAW+JPEG
drivemodes: Single, High-speed continuous, Low-speed continuous, Silent Single Shooting and Self-timer (10-sec. self-timer/remote control, or 2-sec. self-timer/remote control)
externalflashcontrol: Flash mode, sync setting, FEB (not with 270EX II / 270EX), flash exposure compensation, E-TTL II, zoom, wireless master flash, (not with 430EX II / 270EX), and clear settings.
label8: - AF information (AF point, focus confirmation, AF status indicator) - Exposure information (Metering mode, shooting mode, AE lock, shutter speed, aperture, exposure compensation, ISO speed (always displayed), exposure level, exposure warning) - Flash information (Flash ready, high-speed sync, FE lock, flash exposure compensation) - Image information (White balance correction, highlight-tone priority (D+), maximum burst (2-digit display), CF card information, JPEG/RAW indicator) - Battery check - Composition information (Grid, electronic level)
label3: PC Terminal Provided; accepts third-party flash units with sync line voltages up to 250V maximum
picturestyle: Auto, Standard, Portrait, Landscape, Neutral, Faithful, Monochrome, User Defined 1-3
rawjpegsimultaneousrecording: The image-recording quality can be selected in any combination of the three RAW and four JPEG recording quality settings.
label80: Indicated by transmissive LCD display in the viewfinder and on the LCD panel
settings: Auto, Daylight, Shade, Cloudy, Tungsten Light, White Fluorescent Light, Flash, Custom, Color Temperature setting
label88: Partial metering (center, approx. TBA% of viewfinder)
label18: Dust Delete Data acquisition and appending
label19: The coordinates of the dust adhering to the infrared- and ultraviolet-blocking glass are detected by a test shot and appended to subsequent images.
label12: Exact file sizes depend on the subject, ISO speed, Picture Style, etc.
label16: Self-cleaning executed automatically (taking about 1.8 sec.) when power is turned on or off. Manual execution also possible (taking about 5.2 sec.).
label17: Low-pass filter has a fluorine coating.
label15: Removes dust adhering to the infrared- and ultraviolet-blocking glass.
label93: With automatic AF point selection, center spot metering is set.
afassistbeam: When an external EOS-dedicated Speedlite is attached to the camera, the AF-assist beam from the Speedlite will be emitted when necessary.
standard: Select one of the CF cards to record.
label69: For automatic AF point selection, the AF point to start the AI Servo AF operation can be selected.
imagesensor: High-sensitivity, high-resolution, large single-plate CMOS sensor
label60: - AF information (AF point, focus confirmation, AF status indicator) - Exposure information (Metering mode, shooting mode, AE lock, shutter speed, aperture, exposure compensation, ISO speed (always displayed), exposure level, exposure warning) - Flash information (Flash ready, high-speed sync, FE lock, flash exposure compensation) - Image information (White balance correction, highlight-tone priority (D+), maximum burst (2-digit display), CF card information, JPEG/RAW indicator) - Battery check - Composition information (Grid, electronic level)
exposurecontrolsystems: Program AE (Shiftable), Shutter-priority AE, Aperture-priority AE, Manual exposure, Bulb, E-TTL II autoflash program AE
magnification: Approx. 0.76x (-1m -1 with 50mm lens at infinity) / 35.0° angle of view
recordingformat: Design Rule for Camera File System 2.0 and EXIF 2.3
afpoints: 61-point AF *One to five cross-type AF points at f/2.8, 10 to 20 cross-type AF points at f/4, and 15 to 21 cross-type AF points at f/5.6. (The number of cross-type AF points will differ depending on the lens.)
filenumbering: Consecutive numbering, auto reset, manual reset. Possible to create new folders and select folders in the CF card
autowhitebalance: Auto white balance with the image sensor
meteringmodes: 252-zone metering with approx. 100,000-pixel RGB AE sensor and TTL maximum aperture metering employed. The following metering modes selectable
afareaandafpointselection: From the Orientation Linked AF Point menu, the AF area and manually-selectable AF point can be set separately for horizontal and vertical (camera grip at the top or bottom) shooting.
affunctionregistrationswitching: With a Custom Function, four types of AF function settings can be registered in a group
label20: The dust coordinate data appended to the image is used by the provided software to automatically erase the dust spots.
lowpassfilter: Fixed position in front of the image sensor
maximumburst: The maximum burst during continuous shooting is as follows
